effect.spells_and_shields.extra_mana.des: Adds burnable mana bottles (which can't be replenished); higher levels give more extra mana.
effect.spells_and_shields.instant_mana.d: Replenishes mana; higher levels increase the effect potency.
effect.spells_and_shields.leaking.descri: Burns mana over time; higher levels burn more mana.
effect.spells_and_shields.magic_immune.d: Makes you ignore any magic damage.
effect.spells_and_shields.mana_bomb.desc: Burns mana; higher levels increase the effect potency.
effect.spells_and_shields.mana_boost.des: Increases maximum mana; higher levels give more additional mana bottles.
Replenishes mana over time; higher levels make mana be replenished quicker.
effect.spells_and_shields.silence.descri: No spells can be used while this effect is active.
enchantment.spells_and_shields.mana_rege: Increases your mana regeneration while worn. More potent on chestplates and leggings than helmets and boots.
Increases your maximum mana while worn. More potent on chestplates and leggings than helmets and boots.
requirement.spells_and_shields.learned.e: Unknown Node ID '%s' in Spell Tree '%s' (Data Pack Error)
spell.spells_and_shields.blast_smelt.des: Works like an instant blast furnace on the item in your hand.
Any item that goes into a blast furnace
spell.spells_and_shields.blow_arrow.desc: Shoot a projectile from your hand without a bow.
spell.spells_and_shields.drain_flame.des: Drain fire to convert it into mana regeneration. The fire must be infinite (eg. on top of Netherrack) for this to work.
spell.spells_and_shields.ender_army.desc: Make all Endermen close to the target you are looking at attack said target.
spell.spells_and_shields.evoker_fangs.de: Summon Fangs forward like an Evoker.
spell.spells_and_shields.fire_charge.des: Shoot a fire charge forward instantly.
spell.spells_and_shields.flamethrower.de: Breath flames from your mouth setting everything on fire.
spell.spells_and_shields.forced_teleport: Randomly teleport the target you are looking at away. This spell can fail.
spell.spells_and_shields.ghast.desc: Shoot a fire charge forward, like a Ghast.
spell.spells_and_shields.growth.desc: Apply the effect of Bonemeal to plants around you.
spell.spells_and_shields.instant_mine.de: Breaks the block you are looking at using the tool in your hand.
The tool to break the block with
spell.spells_and_shields.jump.desc: High jump. Be aware of fall damage.
spell.spells_and_shields.lightning_strik: Summon a lightning strike where you are looking at. The target must see skylight.
spell.spells_and_shields.mana_soles.desc: Consumes mana to reduce or cancel fall damage.
spell.spells_and_shields.permanent_aqua_: Take less damage from most mobs while underwater.
spell.spells_and_shields.permanent_condu: Applies the %s effect while this spell is equipped.
spell.spells_and_shields.permanent_dolph: Applies the %s effect while this spell is equipped.
spell.spells_and_shields.permanent_fire_: Applies the %s effect while this spell is equipped.

spell.spells_and_shields.pocket_rocket.d: Fire a bunch of Firework Rockets in a row to boost Elytra flight.
spell.spells_and_shields.potion_shot.des: Shoots the contents of the potion in your hand forward.
spell.spells_and_shields.pressurize.desc: Knock back every entity around you and remove any fluid.
spell.spells_and_shields.random_teleport: Randomly teleport away. This spell can fail.
Silence the target you are looking at within a certain range.
spell.spells_and_shields.spit_metal.desc: Spit a nugget that deals damage (from your hand).
spell.spells_and_shields.summon_animal.d: Create life based on the item in your hand.
spell.spells_and_shields.teleport.desc: Teleport to where you are looking at.

spell.spells_and_shields.water_leap.desc: Leap forward like a dolphin (must be underwater).
spell.spells_and_shields.water_whip.desc: Shoots water out of the water bucket in your hand. The water returns and the bucket refills if you hold it on return
